title: Archery World Tour
description:
You must enter different archery tournaments around the world and for each tournament you win, you can progress to the next one. The controls are simple â€“ use the left mouse button to aim and release to fire your arrow.
Once you have conquered the tournaments, you can have a go at the challenge game mode in which you must try and hit a myriad of moving targets. This game is absolutely amazing and for anyone who enjoys a challenge or who loves archery, this is the game for you! Have fun and test your shooting skills today!
